How do i play with just my friend online

Hi guys thanks for the comments so far :).

HEKTIC12 

glad you got it working mate. To play with your friend you and he need to have the same game version 2.0.6.1 for example.

The host

1. The first thing the host needs to do is open game and open there console. 

2. Now they need to start a map so if you wanted to play versus he/she would type:

map c1m1_hotel versus 

3. Now the hoster must give his ip address to the joiner. he can get his ip address by going to whatsmyip in google.

The Joiner

1. Once you have your friends IP you need to open your game and open console.

2. Inside the console window type:

connect (IP) ....

so if your friends IP is  94.106.21.7 you would type:

connect 94.106.21.7

Alternatively you could both use the SFK Server Launcher to join and host games, which will make things a little easier.
